text: Louis Ambroise Marie Pauly (4 April 1906 - 14 December 1992) was a sailor from France, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. == References == * Category:1906 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 12' Dinghy Category:Olympic sailors of France Category:French male sailors (sport)
title: Louis Pauly (sailor)
